Package edu.utah.cdmcc.decisionsupport.drools

This package contains logging objects related to auditing Drools.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AuditView This view has been essentially lifted from the Drools distribution, with minimal changes to accomodate the decision support applications.
AuditViewContentProvider Provides content to the debug views.
DeleteLogAction Action to clear the log.
DroolsDebugEventHandlerView A generic Drools debug view.
DroolsDebugViewContentProvider A generic Drools debug view content provider.
DroolsPluginImages Handles the images used in this plugin.
OpenLogAction Action to open a log.
RefreshLogAction Action to refresh the log.
ShowEventCauseAction Action to show the cause event of an audit event.
ShowLogicalStructureAction Action to toggle the display of the logical structure of variables that are shown in the tree.
 

Package edu.utah.cdmcc.decisionsupport.drools Description

This package contains logging objects related to auditing Drools. This package basically provides the rules audit view, which has been used nearly unchanged from the Drools distribution.

Author: J. Michael Dean, M.D., M.B.A. (University of Utah School of Medicine)

Copyright 2005 to 2008. All rights reserved.
